item.title: Storm Louis is coming
item.description: Big storm coming tonight. Hoppefuly we won’t get more bridges like this.

item.title: Doesn't know how to keep know how
item.description: A friend works for a company that, after acquiring a software company for millions just for their know-how, allowed them to work in a silo while integrating their software into the main data stream. Subsequently, the company proceeded to fire them all. Now, they can’t understand or perform the required maintenance on what has become essential software. Having none of the knowledge that cost millions to acquire, the company has decided to fix this issue by hiring external consultants instead of relying on in-house developers.

item.title: About
item.description: rambling /ˈramblɪŋ,ˈrambəlɪŋ/ adjective (of writing or speech) lengthy and confused or inconsequential.

item.title: Carne
item.description: Vaca Antes da tradução há que memorizar o “mapa” da vaca. Cernelha (cachaço) - Assar, Estufar; Cernelha (acém redondo) - Assar, grelhar; Costeletas de lombo - Assar, grelhar; Vazia (rosbife) - Assar, grelhar; Alcatra - Grelhar, assar; Chã de fora - Grelhar e assar; Rabadilha - Grelhar, assar, fritar; Aba das costelas carregada - Grelhar; Peito - Estufar; Aba das costelas descarregada - Assar, Estufar; Aba descarregada (rolo) - Recheado e assar no forno; Jarrete (chambão, lagarto) - Estufar; Pá (espádua) - Grelhar, assar, estufar; Rabo - Estufar; Coelho - Assar no forno, grelhar; Nispo (gémeos) - Estufar; (A) Chã de dentro (pojadouro) - Grelhar; Português Neerlandês Lombo Haas Porco Português Neerlandês Lombo Haas Costoletas Carbonade Entrecosto Krabbetjes Entrecosto (piano) Spareribs Entremeada Speklapje
